headline: Honeywell, GE Vernova and 5 More Trendy Industrial Plays With AI Ties
summary: Now, add seven U.S. and European industrial stocks from Evercore ISI that fit the bill.  On Monday, the broker launched coverage of the industrial names, which all provide power and automation technologies, with Buy ratings.
